segments.text: Would you mail a letter for me ? My hands are full .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I am sorry . I ’ m afraid I can ’ t do it now . I have to meet my supervisor in a few seconds . But I could mail it after that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s fine . We ’ re going to drop in and see Jimmy tonight . Don ’ t forget it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don ’ t mention it . See you .
segments.speaker: S2
